meanings.definition: The upper interior surface of a room.
meanings.sent1: The ceilings in the classroom were painted blue.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to clean the ceilings regularly to avoid dust buildup.
meanings.sent3: The spider decided to hang from the ceiling and surprise everyone.
meanings.sent4: The ceilings of the art gallery seemed to touch the sky with their grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The ceilings of the old castle were adorned with intricate designs and paintings.

meanings.definition: An upper limit set on something, such as prices or levels.
meanings.sent1: There is a ceiling on how much you can spend on this project.
meanings.sent2: The government has imposed a ceiling on the number of visitors allowed in the park.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog seemed to hit the ceiling of absurdity.
meanings.sent4: The ceiling on sugar intake is meant to promote healthier eating habits.
meanings.sent5: The ceiling on the stock price prevented further investment in the company.
